title: Calculate Date Difference in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore how to calculate the difference (in days) between two given dates using JavaScript. We will use the Date object and write a function that subtracts the initial date from the final date and divides the result by the number of milliseconds in a day. This lab will help you understand how to work with dates in JavaScript and perform date calculations efficiently.

meta.title: Date Difference Calculation | JavaScript Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to calculate the difference in days between two dates using JavaScript. Explore the Date object and write a function to perform efficient date calculations.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Date, Date Calculation, Date Difference, Date Manipulation

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 用 JavaScript 计算日期差
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用 JavaScript 计算两个给定日期之间的天数差。我们将使用 Date 对象，并编写一个函数，该函数用结束日期减去开始日期，然后将结果除以一天中的毫秒数。本实验将帮助你了解如何在 JavaScript 中处理日期，并高效地执行日期计算。

meta.title: 日期差计算 | JavaScript 教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用 JavaScript 计算两个日期之间的天数差。探索 Date 对象并编写一个函数来执行高效的日期计算。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 日期, 日期计算, 日期差, 日期操作

verify.name: 在 ZSH 历史记录中验证 Node 命令
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并按回车键，可以运行 JavaScript。
